name: Inkscape Python Iterator
short_description: An inkscape extension, written in python, that accepts snippets of Python code, and iteratively executes them over a set of objects. Iteration can be over the current selection, or over an XPath. Python code is given the current node and attributes, and can modify or delete the node, create new nodes, or simply perform calculations.
summary: Extension to iterate custom Python snippets over objects

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: End Users/Desktop
